title: RR campus food delivery app
content:
y'all i had an idea for a side gig mobile app similar to swiggy/zomato which would let you place orders for food from various stores across RR campus (cantina/13th floor BE block/SKM bakery) and have them delivered to your classroom within 3-5 minutes for a charge of 5-10rs per order, i wanted to know, if this app existed, would you use it?

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/1j02vdr)

comments.body: idk if something like this already exists, if it does pls lmk i could use one
How would you handle the logistics? Who is going to be delivering the food?
hell nawhh(apply your brain for fksake, they dont even have this in huge acres IIT's and BITS and peeps in pes :/)

Instead you could make an app that accepts pre-ordering from various stores within RR  and you can then collect it by asking them to sign the displayed QR code. Will eliminate the long waiting time and chaos during breaks
people aren't that lazy to walk up to the food court i suppose. instead you could make a pre-order and pickup app to ease the queue in food court.
Lmfao, I hope you're not a BBA student cause this is stupid
